text: hidden gems overrated when tour buses unload there daily
Ever seen tax return instructions? Feels like reading encrypted hieroglyphs!
Always fact-checking random stuff now - mates reckon it’s extra!
Beans? Weak! Heard of unicorn breeding start-ups? Total facepalm moment.
media's rough too; gotta hustle harder when you're not fitting people’s boxes
Absolutely feel you on relying on solid outputs - had articles break stereotypes just 'cause they couldn't argue against facts and storytelling skill! Keep proving 'em wrong one story at a time!
Journalism here's becoming pretty mixed too. Still see some old timers scratching their heads at women taking lead roles though - change ain't winning everyone over yet!
